attributes.review:
i normally like to lick my apps before using them, but this one.. this one stank like that one guy who has yellow hair and a hot son, i think his name is Dump? i don’t know, anyway, i still decided to taste the app and it was ✨DISGUSTING✨ 
i am beyond disgusted and would NOT recommend.
attributes.title: smelt and tasted disgusting

attributes.review: This app is probably the worst app out right now! It’s absolutely disgusting and the graphics? My grandparents can come up with something completely better. Please delete this app it’s not useful for anyone.
attributes.title: Very useless

attributes.review: Anyways I was minding my own business, then * BOOM* a motherfricker popped out of god dang know where and started robbing my house . This was right after I downloaded the app . The app is a hacker , I repeat a hacker . Don’t get it . That’s a warning . And luv if you do , tell the robber I said hi 😘. And go d . Thanks
attributes.title: Robbed

attributes.review: i downloaded the app and everything thing in my life went horribly. i was going to work when a monkey hopped on my car and broke through my windshield. once i got to work a customer spit in my face and told me that i should vote for trump. i was then pummeled with maga merchandise until i couldn’t breathe. it was horrible i had to delete while i could but while i was deleting the app an orange man stole my phone!!!! don’t download!!
attributes.title: literally awful

attributes.review: Trump is the root of all problems and he doesn't need to be in office anymore he can't jump of a building and if he survives he can jump again for legal reasons that was a joke🥰✨✨✨✨💅🙈jk no it wasn't if I go missing because of this then bye🙈🙈🙈🙈✨✨🤷‍♀️🥳💧🥳👄👀🥰❤️
attributes.title: Kys trump

attributes.review: This app is literally the worst. I downloaded it to keep up with Trumps campaign and information, it doesn’t show anything at all. It’s pathetic. I wish I would have never even taken the time to download it. Worst mistake of my life!
attributes.title: Do NOT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.review: This app is horrible and would not load properly. Most of information on there was biased and it does not deserve to be #13 in news.
attributes.title: Would not recommend

attributes.review: I didn’t even get a chance to put in my information before I was bombarded with Trump 2020 emails and messages. My device started overheating and caught on fire. The firefighters didn’t come fast enough and now I’m homeless. Thanks Trump 😔
attributes.title: Terrible!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see why people support Donald Trump. Instead of seeing real facts and reasons why I should support him I see fake news everywhere. This whole app is horrible, I don’t recommend it to anyone.
attributes.title: Isn’t helpful.

attributes.review: I can’t believe how inaccurate this news source is. It says it is against fake news but is filled to the brim with it. I highly encourage everyone to delete it immediately!
attributes.title: Horrible news source
